issue.title: [R] Integer overflow in write_parquet chunk size calculation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14894](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14894). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As reported in https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/11782, multiplying an integer by another integer to calculate the total number of cells can lead to an integer overflow
